mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T09_PER_HIS_STREAM ( HIS_ID , TYPE , PATH , REMARKS , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{hisID} , #{type} , #{path} , #{remarks} , #{createDate} , #{createTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T09_PER_HIS_STREAM SET HIS_ID = #{hisID} , TYPE = #{type} , PATH = #{path} , REMARKS = #{remarks} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , HIS_ID AS "hisID" , TYPE AS "type" , PATH AS "path" , REMARKS AS "remarks" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T09_PER_HIS_STREAM WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , HIS_ID AS "hisID" , TYPE AS "type" , PATH AS "path" , REMARKS AS "remarks" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T09_PER_HIS_STREAM WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , HIS_ID AS "hisID" , TYPE AS "type" , PATH AS "path" , REMARKS AS "remarks" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T09_PER_HIS_STREAM WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
